import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom' const DetailCategory = ({ categories, products }) => { let { id } = useParams(); let { cateId } = useParams(); const productCateid = products.find(categories.id == cateId); const category = categories.find(category => category.id == id); const mystyle = { fontFamily: "Arial", fontWeight: "bold", color: "black" }; return (

{category.name_category}

{category.desc_category}

{products.map((product, index) => product.cateId == category.id && )}
# Name Image Price
{index + 1} {product.name} {product.price}
) } DetailCategory.propTypes = { } export default DetailCategory
